## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy">MachineSchedStrategy</a> implementation for PowerPC post RA scheduling.

### tryCandidate() {#aa6664186ee0da2c7355def751d53a653}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool PPCPostRASchedStrategy::tryCandidate (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/genericschedulerbase/schedcandidate">SchedCandidate</a> &amp; Cand, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/genericschedulerbase/schedcandidate">SchedCandidate</a> &amp; TryCand)</>}
  labels = {["protected", "virtual"]}>
Apply a set of heuristics to a new candidate for PostRA scheduling.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Cand">provides the policy and current best candidate.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="TryCand">refers to the next <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> candidate, otherwise uninitialized.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
<code>true</code> if TryCand is better than Cand (Reason is NOT NoCand)
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcmachinescheduler-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcmachinescheduler-h">PPCMachineScheduler.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcmachinescheduler-cpp/#l00177">177</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppcmachinescheduler-cpp">PPCMachineScheduler.cpp</a>.
